name: Sunset Rangers
description: Experience the American Frontier as you traverse through unique landscapes, surviving unforgiving deserts and malevolent enemies along the way. Build a custom character, complete quests, collect and craft materials, build bases and take down enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows Vista Processor: 3.0+ GHz (quad core recommended); Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 7800 series  or nVidia GeForce GTX 500 series (DOES NOT SUPPORT INTEL HD GRAPHICS) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel 4770 or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 200 series Nvidia GTX 700 series (DOES NOT SUPPORT INTEL HD GRAPHICS) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: We recommend running the server on a different computer.
